name: North European Cybersecurity Cluster NECC
goal: Promote issues in the field of information security and cybersecurity in the Nordic region.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: GDPR, Privacy, Imaterial and Property Rights, Cybersecurity, Cybersecurity related legislation, Trade, Information Security, Cybersecurity Act, ENISA, competence centers, funding
